cons: Remedy against flatulence in small amounts. But large amounts can trigger it, not just flatulence, but also heartburn.
description: Capers are a storehouse of essential vitamins and other nutrients such as Vitamin A, Vitamin B12, Vitamin E, Vitamin K, fiber and niacin.
The nutritional benefits contained in Capers proficiently cures infection, digestive disorders, cancer, diabetes etc.
Capers help to reduce the high blood sugar levels, high cholesterol levels and correct the functioning of liver in Diabetic people.
Capers are a perfect combination of high fiber content and low calories.
Capers consist of good amount of Vitamin K that helps to increase the density of your bones.
Caper consists of good amount of useful flavonoids like rutin and quercetin which makes it beneficial in preventing cancer and skin ailments.
Capers are also good source of Vitamin E that helps to maintain the uniformity of the cells contained by the mucus membrane.
Capers consist of good amount of iron which promotes the formation of hemoglobin in the body and cures anemia.
